Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary  Westbound Reroute near Cermak/Kilbourn
ShortDescription: Westbound 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Kostner, 16th, Cicero and Cermak: due to, street blockage near Cermak/Kilbourn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Kostner, 16th, Cicero and Cermak: due to, street blockage near Cermak/Kilbourn.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
